text: Panicos Nicolaou is a Cypriot banker, and the chief executive officer (CEO) of the Bank of Cyprus, the country's largest bank, since September 2019. ==Biography== Nicolaou earned a BSc in Financial Services from the School of Management, UMIST, UK, a BSc in Mechanical Engineering from the National Technical University of Athens (Metsovio), Greece and an MSc in Mechanical & Industrial Engineering from the University of Illinois at Urbana–Champaign, US. Nicolaou joined the Bank of Cyprus in 2001, rising to director of corporate banking in June 2016. In September 2019, he succeeded John Hourican as CEO. ==References== Category:Bank of Cyprus Category:Cypriot chief executives Category:National Technical University of Athens alumni Category:University of Illinois at Urbana–Champaign alumni Category:Alumni of the University of Manchester Category:Cypriot bankers Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people
title: Panicos Nicolaou
